mention.text: `` MOSCOW -LRB- Reuters -RRB- - A Russian court rejected a request by prosecutors to put Kremlin foe Alexei Navalny behind bars during a second trial on theft charges , leaving one of President Vladimir Putin 's most prominent critics under house arrest .
part of a intensified clampdown on dissent since his return to the Kremlin
